comment.author: 57668330@N00
comment._content: The former General Post Office building (1839) at 700 F Street, NW. Now occupied by the Hotel Monaco.

comment.author: 7471115@N08
comment._content: You beat me to it, rockcreek! Wow, wonderful 1890 image of a site I walk past almost every day.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Rockcreek, The URL you plugged in was a temporary one. Here are are a few individual LoC pictures of the building. hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/det.4a10711 hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3g05636 hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3c12294 and the HABS (Historical American Building Survey) material for the building: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/hhh.dc0290
